subject: Boxing
Prisons and Prisoners
lead_paragraph: From Jake LaMotta and Sonny Liston to Mike Tyson and Bernard Hopkins, boxing has always attracted, and often forgiven, a criminal element. Now, add Gabriel Bracero to the list.
snippet: From Jake LaMotta and Sonny Liston to Mike Tyson and Bernard Hopkins, boxing has always attracted, and often forgiven, a criminal element. Now, add Gabriel Bracero to the list.
